DiagLib_CrcTestParams Struct Reference
CRC Diag Lib

Structure containing input parameters for CRC software test. More...

#include <diagLib_crc.h>

uint32_t crcEdmaTccNum
 

Detailed Description

Structure containing input parameters for CRC software test.

Field Documentation

uint32_t DiagLib_CrcTestParams::baseAddr

Base address of the CRC module

uint32_t DiagLib_CrcTestParams::bitSize

Input Data width can be 32-bit or 64-bit. Refer enum DiagLib_CrcBitSize_t.

uint32_t DiagLib_CrcTestParams::chNumber

CRC Channel number used for testing. Refer enum crcChannel_t.

uint32_t DiagLib_CrcTestParams::crcCheckMode

Interrupt or Polled mode to check CRC compression complete Refer enum DiagLib_CrcCheckMode_t.

uint32_t DiagLib_CrcTestParams::crcEdmaChNum

EDMA params are required for writing 64 bits of data at once. This is because CRC is calculated for 64 bit data. Otherwise CRC value would change if 32bits are written. EDMA is not used in Full CPU mode or 32 bit data size.Channel number for EDMA transfer.

uint32_t DiagLib_CrcTestParams::crcEdmaEvtqNum

Event queue number for EDMA transfer.

uint32_t DiagLib_CrcTestParams::crcEdmaTccNum

Channel number on which EDMA transfer completion interrupt is generated

uint32_t DiagLib_CrcTestParams::dataSize

Size of the data in bytes for which CRC has to be calculated. Datasize should be multiple of 64-bits for SemiCPU mode i.e. divisible by DIAGLIB_CRC_PATTERN_SIZE_64_BIT.

uint32_t DiagLib_CrcTestParams::mode

Mode of operation of CRC. Refer crcOperationMode_t

uint32_t* DiagLib_CrcTestParams::testData

Pointer to the data to be tested in DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_USER. The address should be 32bit aligned. This value need not be populated for inbuilt test.

uint32_t DiagLib_CrcTestParams::testType

Number of iterations of CRC compression. Refer enum DiagLib_CrcTestType_t.

uint32_t DiagLib_CrcTestParams::timeout

Choose the timeout value within which polling has to be completed failing which test API returns with a failure. Value to be given in milli seconds.
